project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game.

task.name: Define the question and answer data structure
Implement the function to display questions and capture user responses
Implement the scoring mechanism to track user answers
Write a function to display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the functions implemented
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure they function correctly
